str2: Thus, so, in this manner. Or (referring to what precedes or follows).

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Middle or Passive - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To reckon, count, charge with; reason, decide, conclude; think, suppose.

parse: Reflexive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Plural

str2: (a) adj: dead, lifeless, subject to death, mortal, (b) noun: a dead body, a corpse. From an apparently primary nekus; dead.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Accusative Masculine Plural
str2: To live, be alive. A primary verb; to live.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Anointed One; the Messiah, the Christ. From chrio; Anointed One, i.e. The Messiah, an epithet of Jesus.
Of Hebrew origin; Jesus, the name of our Lord and two other Israelites.
